Here are some of the lists of musical instruments catalog (50 of catalogs):

This is a violin, or known as fiddle. It is part of the String Instruments and the smallest, and it is originally invented in Italy in 1550s by Andre Amati.
This is an electric guitar, and it is a String Instruments and part of the guitar family invented in 1932 by jazz group players in United States.
This is an Acoustic guitar, also part of the guitar family and string instruments, it is invented by Antonio Torres Jurado in 1830s from Spain.
